Title: Barefoot
Writer: Til Schweiger (screenplay), Jann Preuss (screenplay), Nika von Altenstadt (screenplay), Stephen Zotnowski (screenplay), Stephen Zotnowski (story)
Actors: Til Schweiger, Johanna Wokalek, Nadja Tiller, Michael Mendl
Plot: Nick, a hedonistic bachelor, falls for an escaped mental patient.
